item.title: Triz-3D_Mouse
item.description: [name::3D Mouse] [SpocWebEntityId::22440] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-move-in-space] Infrared Computer Mouse moves in Space, instead of on a Surface, for Presentations.

item.title: Triz-5-axis_Position
item.description: [name::5-axis Position] [SpocWebEntityId::22441] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-move-in-space] Five-axis Cutting Tool can be positioned where needed.

item.title: Triz-abrasive_Feeder
item.description: [name::abrasive Feeder] [SpocWebEntityId::22491] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-add-functions] To prevent Wear in a Feeder which distributes an abrasive Material, its Surface is made from the abrasive Material.

item.title: Triz-acoustic_Fence
item.description: [name::acoustic Fence] [SpocWebEntityId::22503] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-add-sensor] Replace a physical Fence to confine a Dog or Cat with an acoustic ‘Fence’ (signal audible to the Animal).

item.title: Triz-Add_Foam
item.description: [name::Add Foam] [SpocWebEntityId::22387] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-weigt-lift] Inject foaming Agent into a Bundle of Logs, to make it float better.

item.title: Triz-adding_inert_Ingredients
item.description: [name::adding inert Ingredients] [SpocWebEntityId::22552] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-inert-additives] Increase the Volume of powdered Detergent by adding inert Ingredients. This makes it easier to measure with conventional Tools.

item.title: Triz-adiabatic_Operation
item.description: [name::adiabatic Operation] [SpocWebEntityId::22469] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-high-speed] Cut Plastic faster than Heat can propagate in the Material, to avoid deforming the Shape.

item.title: Triz-Adjustable_Controls
item.description: [name::Adjustable Controls] [SpocWebEntityId::22428] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-optimal-conditions] Adjustable steering wheel (or Seat, or Back Support, or Mirror Position…)

item.title: Triz-adjustable_Dampers
item.description: [name::adjustable Dampers] [SpocWebEntityId::22537] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-change-flexibility] Use adjustable Dampers to reduce the Noise of Parts falling into a Container by restricting the Motion of the Walls of the Container.

item.title: Triz-AGC
item.description: [name::AGC] [SpocWebEntityId::22478] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-feedback] Automatic Volume Control in Audio Circuits

item.title: Triz-Alternate_System
item.description: [name::Alternate System] [SpocWebEntityId::22407] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-prepare-emergency] Alternate Air System for Aircraft Instruments

item.title: Triz-Amplitude_Modulation
item.description: [name::Amplitude Modulation] [SpocWebEntityId::22462] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-vary-oscillations] Replace a continuous Siren with Sound that changes Amplitude and Frequency.

item.title: Triz-Arches_and_Domes
item.description: [name::Arches and Domes] [SpocWebEntityId::22422] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-curved-shape] Use Arches and Domes for Strength in Architecture.

item.title: Triz-Argon_Atmosphere
item.description: [name::Argon Atmosphere] [SpocWebEntityId::22551] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-inert-environment] Prevent Degradation of a hot Metal Filament by using an Argon Atmosphere.

item.title: Triz-astigmatic_optics
item.description: [name::astigmatic optics] [SpocWebEntityId::22362] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-increase-Asymmetry] Use astigmatic optics to merge colors.

item.title: Triz-Asymmetric-mixing
item.description: [name::Asymmetric-mixing] [SpocWebEntityId::22357] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-asymmetrical] Asymmetrical Mixing Vessels or asymmetrical Vanes in symmetrical Vessels improve Mixing (Cement Trucks, Cake Mixers, Blenders).

item.title: Triz-Asymmetric-tire
item.description: [name::Asymmetric-tire] [SpocWebEntityId::22359] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-asymmetrical] Make one Side of a Tire stronger than the other to withstand Impact with the Curb.

item.title: Triz-Audio_Seminar
item.description: [name::Audio Seminar] [SpocWebEntityId::22497] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-use-copies] Listen to an Audio Tape instead of attending a Seminar.

item.title: Triz-Auto-tuning_Engines
item.description: [name::Auto-tuning Engines] [SpocWebEntityId::22533] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-restore-consumable] Automobile Engines that give themselves a ’tune up’ while running (the ones that say ‘100_000 miles between tune ups’)

item.title: Triz-Back-up
item.description: [name::Back-up] [SpocWebEntityId::22406] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-prepare-emergency] Back-up Parachute

item.title: Triz-Backfire
item.description: [name::Backfire] [SpocWebEntityId::22477] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-amplify-harm] Use a Backfire to eliminate the Fuel from a Forest Fire.

item.title: Triz-BiMetal_Spring
item.description: [name::BiMetal Spring] [SpocWebEntityId::22545] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-different-materials] The basic Leaf Spring Thermostat: BiMetal(2 Metals with different Coefficients of Expansion are linked so that it bends one Way when warmer than nominal and the opposite Way when cooler.

item.title: Triz-bipolar_Film_against_Evaporation
item.description: [name::bipolar Film against Evaporation] [SpocWebEntityId::22514] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-isolate] Float a Film of bipolar Material (one end hydrophilic, one end hydrophobic) on a Reservoir to limit Evaporation.

item.title: Triz-Blade_with_Groove
item.description: [name::Blade with Groove] [SpocWebEntityId::22399] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-anticipate-change] Utility Knife Blade made with a Groove allowing the dull Part of the Blade to be broken off, restoring Sharpness.

item.title: Triz-both-sides
item.description: [name::both-sides] [SpocWebEntityId::22366] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-merge-identical] Electronic chips mounted on both sides of a circuit board or subassembly

item.title: Triz-break-symmetry
item.description: [name::break-symmetry] [SpocWebEntityId::22360] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-asymmetrical] While discharging wet Sand through a symmetrical Funnel, the Sand forms an Arch above the Opening, causing irregular Flow.

item.title: Triz-Budgets
item.description: [name::Budgets] [SpocWebEntityId::22481] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-feedback] –Measurements are used to decide when to modify a Process.

item.title: Triz-Buffer_Solution
item.description: [name::Buffer Solution] [SpocWebEntityId::22393] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-control-harm] Buffer a Solution to prevent harm from Extremes of pH.

item.title: Triz-buffering_Material
item.description: [name::buffering Material] [SpocWebEntityId::22475] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-combine-harm] Add a buffering Material to a corrosive Solution.

item.title: Triz-Bullet_Casings
item.description: [name::Bullet Casings] [SpocWebEntityId::22530] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-removed-obsolete] Bullet Casings are ejected after the Gun fires.

item.title: Triz-Butterfly_Keyboard
item.description: [name::Butterfly Keyboard] [SpocWebEntityId::22430] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-movable-parts] The ‘Butterfly’ Computer Keyboard, (also demonstrates Principle 7, ‘Nested Doll’.

item.title: Triz-Carbon_Fiber_Composite
item.description: [name::Carbon Fiber Composite] [SpocWebEntityId::22554] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-composite-materials] Composite Epoxy Resin/Carbon Fiber Golf Club Shafts are lighter, stronger, and more flexible than Metal.

item.title: Triz-Cardio-Pulmonary_Respiration
item.description: [name::Cardio-Pulmonary Respiration] [SpocWebEntityId::22463] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-use-pauses] In Cardio-Pulmonary Respiration (CPR) breathe after every 5 Chest Compressions.

item.title: Triz-Carpenter's_Nailset
item.description: [name::Carpenter’s Nailset] [SpocWebEntityId::22486] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-intermediary] used between the Hammer and the Nail

item.title: Triz-CCD
item.description: [name::CCD] [SpocWebEntityId::22374] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-multi-urpose] CCD (Charge coupled device) with micro-lenses formed on the surface

item.title: Triz-change-shape
item.description: [name::change-shape] [SpocWebEntityId::22361] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-increase-Asymmetry] Change from circular O-rings to oval cross-section to specialized shapes to improve sealing.

item.title: Triz-Change_Measure
item.description: [name::Change Measure] [SpocWebEntityId::22484] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-vary-feedback] Change a Management Measure from Budget Variance to Customer Satisfaction.

item.title: Triz-Change_Process
item.description: [name::Change Process] [SpocWebEntityId::22482] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-vary-feedback] Change Sensitivity of an Autopilot when within 5 Miles of an Airport.

item.title: Triz-Change_Sensitivity
item.description: [name::Change Sensitivity] [SpocWebEntityId::22483] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-vary-feedback] Change Sensitivity of a Thermostat when cooling vs. heating, since it uses Energy less efficiently when cooling.

item.title: Triz-Chimney
item.description: [name::Chimney] [SpocWebEntityId::22511] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-use-fluid] To increase the Draft of an industrial Chimney, a Spiral Pipe with Nozzles was installed. When Air flows through the Nozzles, it creates an air-like Wall, reducing Drag.

item.title: Triz-Chips_on_both_Sides
item.description: [name::Chips on both Sides] [SpocWebEntityId::22443] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-multi-story] Electronic Chips on both Sides of a printed Circuit Board

item.title: Triz-Coating
item.description: [name::Coating] [SpocWebEntityId::22515] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-isolate] Use a thin organic or anorganic Coating to protect Surfaces and thus the whole Structure.

item.title: Triz-Compartments
item.description: [name::Compartments] [SpocWebEntityId::22353] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-condition] Lunch Box with special Compartments for hot and cold solid Foods and for Liquids

item.title: Triz-Compost
item.description: [name::Compost] [SpocWebEntityId::22495] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-use-waste] Use Food and Lawn Waste to create Compost.

item.title: Triz-computer_network
item.description: [name::computer network] [SpocWebEntityId::22363] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-merge-identical] Personal computers in a network

item.title: Triz-conical_Railway_Wheels
item.description: [name::conical Railway Wheels] [SpocWebEntityId::22429] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-optimal-conditions] Use conical Railway Wheels that generate a central Force to stabilize the Wagons.

item.title: Triz-connect_Joints
item.description: [name::connect Joints] [SpocWebEntityId::22343] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-Disassemble] Garden Hoses can be joined together to form any Length.

item.title: Triz-continuous_Bottleneck
item.description: [name::continuous Bottleneck] [SpocWebEntityId::22466] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-continuous-load] Run the Bottleneck Operations in a Factory continuously, to reach the optimum Pace. (From Theory of Constraints, or Takt Time Operations)

item.title: Triz-Convertible
item.description: [name::Convertible] [SpocWebEntityId::22375] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-multi-urpose] Convertible Bed-Sofa or Car

item.title: Triz-Convertible_Seat
item.description: [name::Convertible Seat] [SpocWebEntityId::22371] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-multi-urpose] Child’s car safety seat converts to a stroller

item.title: Triz-Cooking
item.description: [name::Cooking] [SpocWebEntityId::22540] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-change-temperature] Raise the Temperature of Food to cook it. (Changes Taste, Aroma, Texture, chemical Properties, etc.)

item.title: Triz-cool_inner_Part
item.description: [name::cool inner Part] [SpocWebEntityId::22414] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-invert-action] To loosen stuck Parts, cool the inner Part instead of heating the outer Part.

item.title: Triz-Cornstarch-Packaging
item.description: [name::Cornstarch-Packaging] [SpocWebEntityId::22528] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-removed-obsolete] Sprinkle Water on Cornstarch-based Packaging and watch it reduce its Volume by more than 1000*!

item.title: Triz-Cup-Measure
item.description: [name::Cup-Measure] [SpocWebEntityId::22377] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-merge-in-space] Measuring in Cups or Spoons

item.title: Triz-Curie_Point
item.description: [name::Curie Point] [SpocWebEntityId::22539] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-change-temperature] Raise the Temperature above the Curie Point to change a ferromagnetic Substance to a paramagnetic Substance.

item.title: Triz-cylindrical-Vessel
item.description: [name::cylindrical-Vessel] [SpocWebEntityId::22434] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-movable-part] Transport Vessel with a cylindrical-shaped Body. To reduce the Draft or a Vessel under full Load, the Body is comprised of two hinged, half-cylindrical Parts which can be opened.

item.title: Triz-Diamond_Cutting
item.description: [name::Diamond Cutting] [SpocWebEntityId::22525] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-same-material] Make a Diamond Cutting Tool out of Diamonds.

item.title: Triz-dip_into_Paint
item.description: [name::dip into Paint] [SpocWebEntityId::22438] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-accept-less] A Cylinder is painted by dipping into Paint, but contains more Paint than desired. Excess Paint is then removed by rapidly rotating the Cylinder.

item.title: Triz-directed_Radiation
item.description: [name::directed Radiation] [SpocWebEntityId::22507] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-add-structure] Early Communications used omnidirectional Broadcasting. We now use Antennas with very detailed Structure of the Pattern of Radiation.

item.title: Triz-disappearing_Actors
item.description: [name::disappearing Actors] [SpocWebEntityId::22444] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-multi-story] Employees ‘disappear’ from the Customers in a Theme Park, descend into a Tunnel, and walk to their next Assignment, where they return to the Surface and magically reappear.

item.title: Triz-disconnect_Joints
item.description: [name::disconnect Joints] [SpocWebEntityId::22342] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-Disassemble] Quick disconnect Joints in Plumbing.

item.title: Triz-disposable_Paper_Objects
item.description: [name::disposable Paper Objects] [SpocWebEntityId::22502] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-replace-by-multiple] Use disposable Paper Objects to avoid the Cost of cleaning and storing durable Objects. Plastic Cups in Motels, disposable Diapers, many kinds of medical Supplies.

item.title: Triz-dissolving_Capsule
item.description: [name::dissolving Capsule] [SpocWebEntityId::22527] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-removed-obsolete] Use a dissolving Capsule for Medicine.

item.title: Triz-dried_Food
item.description: [name::dried Food] [SpocWebEntityId::22401] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-anticipate-change] Any dried and pre-cooked Food.

item.title: Triz-Dump_Truck
item.description: [name::Dump Truck] [SpocWebEntityId::22446] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-tilt]

item.title: Triz-Electricity_from_Heat
item.description: [name::Electricity from Heat] [SpocWebEntityId::22493] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-use-waste] Use Heat from a Process to generate Electricity: ‘Co-generation’.

item.title: Triz-electrostatically_mix
item.description: [name::electrostatically mix] [SpocWebEntityId::22505] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-use-EM-Field] To mix 2 Powders, electrostatically charge one positive and the other negative. Either use Fields to direct them, or mix them mechanically and let their acquired Fields cause the grains of Powder to pair up.

item.title: Triz-Empty_by_inverting
item.description: [name::Empty by inverting] [SpocWebEntityId::22421] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-upside-down] Empty Grain from Containers (Ship or Railroad) by inverting them.

item.title: Triz-Enemy_substitute
item.description: [name::Enemy substitute] [SpocWebEntityId::22351] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-Separate] Use the Sound, Shape, Smell etc. of an Enemy, without the Enemy itself, to repel Agents.

item.title: Triz-Energy_from_Vibrations
item.description: [name::Energy from Vibrations] [SpocWebEntityId::22452] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-vibrate] Use a statistical Engine to generate mechanical Energy from thermal Vibrations.

item.title: Triz-Energy_from_Waste_Heat
item.description: [name::Energy from Waste Heat] [SpocWebEntityId::22471] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-accept-harm] Use Waste Heat to generate Electric Power.

item.title: Triz-etch_later
item.description: [name::etch later] [SpocWebEntityId::22437] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-accept-less] Oxidize the whole Substrate in MicroElectronics and etch it later.

item.title: Triz-evaporating_Coolant
item.description: [name::evaporating Coolant] [SpocWebEntityId::22519] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-fractal-surface] To avoid pumping Coolant to a Machine, some of its Parts are filled with a porous Material soaked in coolant Liquid.

item.title: Triz-Extending_Antenna
item.description: [name::Extending Antenna] [SpocWebEntityId::22381] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-allow-pass] Extending Radio Telescope Antenna

item.title: Triz-Extending_Pointer
item.description: [name::Extending Pointer] [SpocWebEntityId::22382] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-allow-pass]

item.title: Triz-Fertilizer
item.description: [name::Fertilizer] [SpocWebEntityId::22494] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-use-waste] Use Animal Waste as Fertilizer.

item.title: Triz-Fiber_Optics
item.description: [name::Fiber Optics] [SpocWebEntityId::22349] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-Separate] Use Fiber Optics or a Light Pipe to separate the hot Light Source from the Location where Light is needed.

item.title: Triz-Fiberglass
item.description: [name::Fiberglass] [SpocWebEntityId::22555] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-composite-materials] Fiberglass Surfboards are lighter and more controllable and easier to form into a variety of Shapes than wooden ones.

item.title: Triz-flashing_Light
item.description: [name::flashing Light] [SpocWebEntityId::22460] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-periodic-action] A Warning Lamp flashes so that it is even more noticeable than when continuously lit.

item.title: Triz-flat_Spot
item.description: [name::flat Spot] [SpocWebEntityId::22358] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-asymmetrical] Put a flat Spot on a cylindrical Shaft to attach a Knob securely.

item.title: Triz-flexible_Boroscope
item.description: [name::flexible Boroscope] [SpocWebEntityId::22431] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-movable-part] The flexible Boroscope for examining Engines

item.title: Triz-flexible_Gooseneck
item.description: [name::flexible Gooseneck] [SpocWebEntityId::22433] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-movable-part] Flashlight with a flexible Gooseneck between the Body and the Lamp Head.

item.title: Triz-flexible_Sigmoidoscope
item.description: [name::flexible Sigmoidoscope] [SpocWebEntityId::22432] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-movable-part] The flexible Sigmoidoscope, for medical Examination

item.title: Triz-Flywheel
item.description: [name::Flywheel] [SpocWebEntityId::22465] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-continuous-load] Flywheel (or hydraulic System) stores Energy when a Vehicle stops, so the Motor can keep running at optimum Power.

item.title: Triz-Foam_Packaging
item.description: [name::Foam Packaging] [SpocWebEntityId::22512] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-use-fluid] For shipping fragile Products, Air Bubble Envelopes or Foam-like Materials are used. Liquids and Gases are not worn and distribute directed Energy in all Directions.

item.title: Triz-Foldable_Ruler
item.description: [name::Foldable Ruler] [SpocWebEntityId::22347] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-Fragment]

item.title: Triz-Freeze_liquid
item.description: [name::Freeze liquid] [SpocWebEntityId::22534] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-change-aggregate] Freeze the liquid Centers of filled Candies, then dip in melted Chocolate, instead of handling the messy, gooey, hot Liquid.

item.title: Triz-Frequency_Modulation
item.description: [name::Frequency Modulation] [SpocWebEntityId::22461] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-vary-oscillations] Use Frequency Modulation to convey Information, instead of Morse Code.

item.title: Triz-Funnel
item.description: [name::Funnel] [SpocWebEntityId::22439] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-accept-less] To obtain uniform Discharge of a metallic Powder from a Bin, the Hopper has a special internal Funnel which is continually overfilled to provide nearly constant Pressure.

item.title: Triz-Gradient
item.description: [name::Gradient] [SpocWebEntityId::22352] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-non-uniform] Use a Temperature, Density, or Pressure Gradient instead of constant Temperature, Density or Pressure.

item.title: Triz-Gyrocompass
item.description: [name::Gyrocompass] [SpocWebEntityId::22479] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-feedback] Signal from Gyrocompass is used to control simple Aircraft Autopilots.

item.title: Triz-hammer
item.description: [name::hammer] [SpocWebEntityId::22457] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-periodic-action] Hitting something repeatedly with a hammer.

item.title: Triz-Hammer_with_Nail_Puller
item.description: [name::Hammer with Nail Puller] [SpocWebEntityId::22355] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-different]

item.title: Triz-Heat_ferromagnetic_Material
item.description: [name::Heat ferromagnetic Material] [SpocWebEntityId::22508] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-use-field] Heat a Substance containing ferromagnetic Material by using varying magnetic Field. When the Temperature exceeds the Curie Point, the material becomes paramagnetic, and no longer absorbs Energy.

item.title: Triz-Heat_Pumps
item.description: [name::Heat Pumps] [SpocWebEntityId::22543] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-phase-transition] Heat Pumps use the Heat of Vaporization and Heat of Condensation of a closed thermodynamic Cycle to do useful Work.

item.title: Triz-Helium-Oxygen_Mix
item.description: [name::Helium-Oxygen Mix] [SpocWebEntityId::22476] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-combine-harm] Use a Helium-Oxygen Mix for Diving, to eliminate both Nitrogen Narcosis and Oxygen Poisoning from Air and other Nitrox Mixes.

item.title: Triz-high_Speed_Operation
item.description: [name::high Speed Operation] [SpocWebEntityId::22468] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-high-speed] Use a high Speed Dentist’s Drill to avoid Heating Tissue.

item.title: Triz-Holes_to_reduce_the_Weight
item.description: [name::Holes to reduce the Weight] [SpocWebEntityId::22516] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-porous] Drill Holes in a Structure to reduce the Weight.

item.title: Triz-Hydrofoils
item.description: [name::Hydrofoils] [SpocWebEntityId::22391] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-weight-environment] Hydrofoils lift Ship out of the Water to reduce Drag.

item.title: Triz-Ice_Structures
item.description: [name::Ice Structures] [SpocWebEntityId::22529] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-removed-obsolete] use Water Ice or Carbon Dioxide (Dry Ice) to make a Template for a rammed Earth Structure, such as a temporary Dam.

item.title: Triz-increase_Variety
item.description: [name::increase Variety] [SpocWebEntityId::22442] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-multi-story] Cassette with 6 CD’s to increase Music Time and Variety

item.title: Triz-inert_Gas
item.description: [name::inert Gas] [SpocWebEntityId::22553] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-inert-additives] To prevent Cotton from catching Fire in a Warehouse, it is treated with inert Gas while being transported to the Storage Area.

item.title: Triz-inflatable_Structures
item.description: [name::inflatable Structures] [SpocWebEntityId::22513] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-use-films] Use inflatable (thin film) Structures as Winter Covers on Tennis Courts.

item.title: Triz-Infrared_Images
item.description: [name::Infrared Images] [SpocWebEntityId::22501] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-use-IR-UV-copies] Make Images in Infrared to detect Heat Sources, such as Diseases in Crops, or Intruders in a security System.

item.title: Triz-Ionize_Air
item.description: [name::Ionize Air] [SpocWebEntityId::22549] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-ionizing] Ionize Air to trap Pollutants in an Air Cleaner.

item.title: Triz-ionize_Gas
item.description: [name::ionize Gas] [SpocWebEntityId::22550] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-ionized-oxygen] Speed up chemical Reactions by ionizing the Gas before Use.

item.title: Triz-Kanban_Arrangements
item.description: [name::Kanban Arrangements] [SpocWebEntityId::22402] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-arrange-parts] Kanban Arrangements in a Just-In-Time Factory

item.title: Triz-kill_Anaerobic_Bacteria
item.description: [name::kill Anaerobic Bacteria] [SpocWebEntityId::22548] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-pure-oxygen] Treat Wounds in a high Pressure Oxygen Environment to kill Anaerobic Bacteria and aid Healing.

item.title: Triz-Laser_Pulses
item.description: [name::Laser Pulses] [SpocWebEntityId::22470] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-high-speed] Use Laser Pulses to process Material and Surfaces without affecting it. (also Principle 19, pulsed Action)

item.title: Triz-Linked_slats
item.description: [name::Linked slats] [SpocWebEntityId::22367] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-merge-in-time] Link slats together in Venetian or vertical blinds.

item.title: Triz-Liquid_Hand_Soap
item.description: [name::Liquid Hand Soap] [SpocWebEntityId::22536] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-change-consistency] Liquid Hand Soap is concentrated and more viscous than Bar Soap at the point of use, making it easier to dispense in the correct Amount and more sanitary when shared by several People.

item.title: Triz-liquidate_Gases
item.description: [name::liquidate Gases] [SpocWebEntityId::22535] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-change-aggregate] Transport Oxygen or Nitrogen or Petroleum Gas as a Liquid, instead of a Gas, to reduce Volume.

item.title: Triz-Lower_Temperature
